name: Rabisco
description:
Help Ms. Rabisco to find the moon's lost stars and bring back the light, in this cute but dangerous world, inspired by the World's Hardest Game.



  • Massive world with 100 levels and +300 screens of precise running and secrets.
  • Super tight control schemes designed for both keyboards and controllers.
  • Cute crayon art style with bright colors and hand drawn lines.
  • Hardcore difficulty +20 types of enemies and interactable objects.
  • Lovely soundtrack inspired by Bossa Nova, the famous Brazilian musical genre.

The night was so bright it could be mistaken by the day.
